Did you know that 1 in 4 people (24%) in Scotland are at risk of harming themselves from the dangerous effects of alcohol?

 Or that there was an estimated 94,360 appointments made with GPs by 48,420 patients in 2019? That's almost double the appointments per patient with alcohol issues!

It is recommended that you drink no more than 14 units of alcohol per week, spread over 4-5 days. Please check the button labelled 'What 14 Units Looks Like' for more information.
